title: Bud Cort, Star of a Famous Movie, Passes Away
summary: Bud Cort was an American actor who became famous for playing Harold in the movie Harold and Maude. He died at age 77 after being sick for a long time. Bud Cort acted in over 80 movies and TV shows, including The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou. In Harold and Maude, his character is a young man who loves an older woman, and the movie became very popular over time. People liked its funny and sad story. Bud Cort was born in New York and loved acting from a young age. He moved to Los Angeles to be in movies and worked for many years. Other actors and directors said nice things about him and his work.
